title: Rainy city driving, moderate speed, 8 braking events
caption: A woman on a bike crosses a rainy city street while the ego vehicle drives at moderate speed.

description: The woman on the bike crosses the street while the ego vehicle drives at moderate speed. The road is wet from the rain, and there are several other cars and pedestrians in the scene. The traffic lights are visible in the distance, and the weather is rainy.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving at moderate speed because it is following the speed limit and the traffic flow.
